about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!

Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Transcompression weapon “Mesimeri” R15-17

  • Active module “Disintegrator circuits overload” R13-17

  • Unique modifier “‘Night hawk’ camo system” R15-17

  • Unique modifier “Matter accelerator” R15-17

  • 60 monocrystals

  • A set of resources with 50 of each ore: Vanadium, Silicon, Graphite, Osmium + 50 Crystal shards

  • A set of paints: “Orchid”, “Shamua” and “Chrome”

  • Unique portrait “Emmet Banks”

  • Colouring “Calaveras”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 15 days!
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!

Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Transcompression weapon “Mesimeri” R15-17

  • Active module “Disintegrator circuits overload” R13-17

  • Unique modifier “‘Night hawk’ camo system” R15-17

  • Unique modifier “Matter accelerator” R15-17

  • 60 monocrystals

  • A set of resources with 50 of each ore: Vanadium, Silicon, Graphite, Osmium + 50 Crystal shards

  • A set of paints: “Orchid”, “Shamua” and “Chrome”

  • Unique portrait “Emmet Banks”

  • Colouring “Calaveras”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 15 days!

movies.name: Star Conflict - Helios. Weapon of victory

name: Star Conflict: Helios. Weapon of victory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
